thread.title: Akhil US audio launch on September 26
thread.title_full: Akhil US audio launch on September 26 - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Akhil US audio launch on September 26
text: With the divine blessings of ANR, the latest sensation in Telugu Movie industry and the third generation hero from Akkineni family, Akhil Akkineni is all set to enthrall the Telugu movie audience in USA with his debut movie, Akhil. Directed by none other than V. V. Vinayak and Sayesha Saigal, grand-daughter of Dilip Kumar, as leading lady and music by Anup Ruebens and Thaman, Akhil is ready to captivate the fans with his spellbound charm, lightening energy and mesmerizing action. The audio release function of Akhil will be held in Dallas, Texas on September 26 at Allen Performing Arts Center. Sayesha Saigal, V. V. Vinayak and Anup Reubens will join Akhil Akkineni for this memorable event in Dallas, which will include ANR Jayanthi celebrations and other cultural events. The Dallas Telugu community is all exited to welcome Akhil Akkineni and his team to Dallas with great southern hospitality and affection.
